name: FEED (zre)
description:
Grow your farm and new flower ̢̲͇͉̺͎̦f̖͈r͓̼̪̖̜͕͘i̠̳̰͈e̹͇̦͠n̡̘̱͉̫̻d͘! Play this game for a ̤̥͚͚̳͇r͕̼͖e̥l̟̰̩̻̜̩̪a̭͎͖̠̙x͎̜͔͝ing experience as you ̨̬̯̣̦ͅc̪̱̤a͍̘r͉̺͘ͅe҉͕̤̟ for your plants, chickens, and̩͉͚̜̮̫͡ ̗a̯̜͉̪ ͎̬̤̗͝n͇̥e̯͖̗̻̹̠w̘̱̪͍̼̭̠ ̟̮̹̱v̢̥͚͙͎͓̦i̶͍̻ͅs͖̥̮̰̞͜ͅí̤̣t͇̬o̬̯͚̘͔ͅr̙̼̝̟̦̪̳.̨̮̺̞̯̤̻

This is my entry to Ludum Dare 41, April 2018. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres" and I chose "Virtual Pet + Horror".

Controls:

WASD/Arrows: Move
Spacebar: Take/Feed/Eat

Tools:

I used Unity3D, Gimp, Krita, Blender, and FL Studio (with the GMS and FL Keys plugins along with some nohidea drum samples) to make this.

The font is from http://www.misprintedtype.com/fonts/freeware/ , and I also made use of the Unity post-processing stack. All the assets (3D models, sprites, textures, sfx + music), game design, and scripting were done within the 48 hours, aside from a last-minute bugfix a few minutes after 8 (the message box was not displaying properly in most situations).

Thanks for checking out my game!
